Subjects: songs, soldiers’; de Mandeville, Geoffrey, earl of Essex
_description: A fragment of an early soldiers’ song, sung by the followers of Geoffrey de Mandeville, Earl of Essex, in one MS of Matthew Paris, Historia Anglorum — couplet

BLRoy14Cvii.Transcription: I ne mai a liuefor benoir ne for Iue
